name: Raising Digital Natives
tag_list: digital-kids, parenting, coaching, consulting, social-media, cyber-saftey, educational-technology
overview:
As a media expert, teacher and parent, I coach parents to create the media ecology that supports their family’s values. I offer workshops, talks, ebooks and tele-courses.

Technology can be an amazing asset for family life–or it can disconnect us from one another. I mentor kids as they build engaged, creative and smart digital lives. I enable schools to understand how their students are actually using technology and build realistic and inclusive tech policies. I offer employers insights on how digital natives think so they can hire and mentor the next generation of innovators.
